name: Simple headache (LOW urgency)
prompt: I'm Maria, 32 years old. I have a headache that started this morning. No other symptoms.

name: Chest pain (CRITICAL urgency)
prompt: I'm Robert Chen, 58. I've had crushing chest pain for 30 minutes, radiating to my jaw and left arm. I'm sweating and nauseous. I take atorvastatin for high cholesterol.

name: Pediatric fever (HIGH urgency)
prompt: My 3-year-old son has a fever of 103F for 24 hours, he's lethargic and not eating. He's allergic to amoxicillin.

name: Diabetes management (MODERATE urgency)
prompt: I'm Linda, 45. I have type 2 diabetes and my blood sugar has been running 250-300 the past week. I take metformin 1000mg twice daily.

name: Minor injury (LOW urgency)
prompt: I'm Tom, 28. I sprained my ankle playing basketball yesterday. It's swollen but I can walk on it. No other injuries.

name: Severe allergic reaction (CRITICAL urgency)
prompt: I'm Sarah, 22. I ate shrimp 10 minutes ago and now my throat is swelling, I'm having trouble breathing, and I have hives all over my body.

name: Complex medical history (MODERATE urgency)
prompt: I'm David, 65. I have hypertension, diabetes, and COPD. I take lisinopril, metformin, and albuterol inhaler. My breathing has been worse this week and I'm coughing up yellow phlegm.

name: Pregnant patient (HIGH urgency)
prompt: I'm Jennifer, 30, and I'm 32 weeks pregnant. I've had a severe headache, blurred vision, and swelling in my hands and feet for the past 2 days. My blood pressure is usually normal.

name: Mental health crisis (HIGH urgency)
prompt: I'm Alex, 35. I've been having thoughts of self-harm for the past week. I have a history of depression and take sertraline 100mg daily, but it doesn't seem to be working anymore.

name: Minimal information (LOW urgency)
prompt: I need to refill my prescription for blood pressure medication. I'm 50 years old.
